app.title: MARK RESUME
app.description: Create beautiful resumes with Markdown, featuring real-time preview and one-click PDF export

guide.title: Quick Start
guide.step1Desc: Write your resume content using Markdown syntax
guide.step2Desc: View your resume effect in real-time on the right
guide.step3Desc: Export to PDF with one click

editor.title: Edit Resume
editor.description: Write your resume using Markdown syntax
editor.previewDesc: View your resume effect in real-time

plugin.iconListTooltip: Icon calling specification: For icons from the iconify.design resource library, add the 'icon:' prefix before the name when using (e.g., 'icon:font-awesome-home'), and refer to the official documentation for specific usage.

themeList.title: Theme List
themeList.description: Select a resume theme style you like, click to apply

themeColorAndBg.title: Theme and Background Settings
themeColorAndBg.description: Customize theme colors and backgrounds to create your unique resume style

idPhoto.title: Upload ID Photo
idPhoto.description: Please upload your ID photo, supports JPG and PNG formats, file size should not exceed 5MB
idPhoto.dragDropHint: or drag and drop file here

templates.title: Featured Resume Templates
templates.description: Carefully selected unique resume templates to help you quickly create professional resumes and showcase your personal advantages.

items.title: Real-time Markdown Preview
items.description: Write and see instantly, supporting rich syntax for efficient resume content editing.

items.title: Multiple Template Styles
items.description: Diverse templates to meet different industry and personalization needs.

items.title: Multi-language Support
items.description: Supports Chinese and English, easily switch between internationalized content.

items.title: One-click PDF Export
items.description: Export high-quality PDFs for easy sharing and submission.

items.title: ID Photo Upload & Edit
items.description: Upload ID photos with drag, zoom, and reset support, real-time preview.

items.title: PWA Offline Support
items.description: Install as desktop or mobile app with offline editing and automatic caching.

items.question: How to export PDF resume?
items.answer: Click the 'Export PDF' button in the top right corner of the editor page to generate a high-definition PDF file with pagination and custom styling support.

items.question: What languages does the resume support?
items.answer: Currently supports Chinese and English. You can switch via the language toggle button in the bottom right corner of the page, with content and UI updating synchronously.

items.question: Does it support offline use?
items.answer: Yes. The project is configured with PWA and can be added to desktop for offline editing. Resources will be automatically cached after the first load.

items.question: Will resume content be lost?
items.answer: No, all content is automatically saved to local cache. Your content will be preserved even after closing the page or refreshing.

footer.description: A modern resume editor supporting Markdown editing, theme switching, export and other features.

resetResume.title: Reset Resume Content
resetResume.description: This action cannot be undone. It will clear your current resume content. Are you sure you want to continue?
